title: Aussie Discord
body:
Hello fellow Summoners,

Looking for voice server to hang out with other players? Look no further than the PRIMAL Community Discord server. The server started out as a place for our fellow PRIMAL clan members to hang out but is open to all.

There are also channels for other games if you like to use them when you are taking a break from grinding all the LP ;)

Casuals and Elites all welcome.

Check it out here:

https://discord.gg/bzjYAqR

-Music Bot
-Casino for a bit of fun
-Ranking system more you type and use the discord the better the rank
